data.name: Black Watch
data.description:
Dearest Boudi,
 This message comes from the deepest corner of my heart,
For everything that you do,
 and all the wisdom you share. 
 I am forever grateful, 
 to have you in my life, 
 who educated me,
 as wonderfully as you.

 Happy Birthday to one of the most wonderful Person.

data.name: Gaming Set
data.description: Dear Mam, Happy Birthday. You are the sweetest mam I have ever met. I really miss those golden days, spending lot of times with you instead of studying, eating chicken pokora, laughing together in silly jokes. You are such a pure soul mam. May God give you long life, bless you with all the happiness. Stay happy and healthy.

data.name: Gaming Set
data.description: Forget the past; it is gone. Do not think of the future; it has not come. But live in the present because it's a gift and that's why it's called the present. Happy birthday,  many many happy returns of the day ‚ú®

data.name: Gaming Set
data.description:
Dear ma'am, 
 We didn't get to do many classes with you but the ones that we had done have been wholesome. Both You and sir have been more of a good friend to us, who has always taught us with utmost care. We're glad that we had a chance to meet you. üòä 
 Today is a day of great importance for you, and we send our warm wishes to you through this small token of love. Happy Birthday ma'am. We hope for your good health and long life. We hope that you're happy always. Thank you for making computer sooo interesting to us. Many many happy returns of the day. ‚ù§Ô∏è
